name: Yume no Office
storyline: "The story follows Satou Kuta, an office worker who leads a normal life. However, upon reuniting with his childhood friend, he decides to change jobs, encountering girls along the way. You will have the opportunity to explore their paths, develop romantic relationships, and delve into a profound story filled with intriguing and emotional situations that will captivate any reader, both fans and casual viewers."
summary: Get ready to step into the ultimate dating simulator and experience the thrill of love in Yume No Office. In this captivating visual novel, you take on the role of Kuta Aoyama, a young professional working in a bustling office alongside five captivating female colleagues. As you navigate your way through the daily grind, you'll have the chance to develop intimate relationships with each of the charming ladies.
